pages.text: $(#630000)The documentation on this was very brief, so I've opted to redo it completely.$(br)Brew Sacs are ranged weapons which behave similarly to Splash Potions, but are reuseable and reloadeable.

$(#630000)They can be given a set of effects and generally configured by an $(l:osmosis_brewing/osmosis)Osmosis$()$(#630000). Most of the information on this item is catalogued in the Osmosis mini-chapter.

$(#630000)Brew Sacs are much like Splash Potions, being throwable and applying effects in an area. They have 16 uses, though, and can be reloaded with biomass. The cost for doing so should be listed in its tooltip, along with any effects or its base damage.

$(#630000)Each effect added to a Brew Sac has a certain biomass cost, and the resulting reloading cost is the sum of these individual costs. This value is multiplied by the current brew amplifier to get the true cost, which is increased with Intensifiers.
$(#630000)Refilling a Brew Sac is as simple as using the item for a few seconds. Additionally, I can prime my throw for a short amount of time to throw it farther, much like a Bow.
